hotels.name: Golden Sands Hotel Apartments
hotels.address: Bur Dubai, Al.Mankhool Road, Bank Street PO BOX 9168
hotels.desc:
GOLDEN SANDS HOTEL APARTMENTS are perfectly placed in the heart of fashionable Bur Dubai, just minutes away from exclusive shopping malls, the new Metro Junction, Khalid bin Al Walid Station and Al Musalla Station approximately 5 minutes walk away, the Central Business District, the Dubai Museum, Heritage Village and the World Trade Centre and Convention halls. Golden Sands is one of the largest hotel-apartments in Dubai with 650 units. 
Golden Sands, your home in Dubai, offers you every comfort of your home with facilities of a deluxe hotel like Swimming Pools, Sauna, Gym and Squash Court. A Car Rental and Tour Desk is located in the lobby. Free Internet facility is available in all rooms. Free wired Internet facility is available in all rooms. Free Wi-Fi connection in the Lobby and Coffee Shop. 
A restaurant, room service, daily housekeeping, 24-hour reception porter and security services are also available.
All units come with a fully-equipped kitchenette, large refrigerator, washing machine/dryer, microwave, digital safe, direct-dialling telephone and satellite channels.
The Studios are in modern building, located in the most elite and cosmopolitan city centre area of Dubai. 
Golden Sands Hotel Apartments offer you the comforts of home and all the conveniences of a modern hotel. 
The Dubai International Airport is just 11 kms away. The tallest tower Burj Khalifa, World Trade Centre and Convention Halls are just 4 kms away. In a proximity of less than 3 kms are the Dubai Museum, Heritage Village, the Textile and Electronics Market, the Bur Juman Shopping Mall and the Central Business District.
A very varied choice of restaurants, fast foods and night spots, from affordable to upscale are available in a radius of less than 2 kms.

hotels.name: Moevenpick Ibn Battuta Gate Hotel Dubai
hotels.desc: Movenpick Hotel Ibn Battuta Gate is a 5 star themed hotel featuring Ibn Battuta Travels. Each Battuta Suite reflects a city visited by Ibn Battuta. the Hotel has an iconic design accessible through 60 meters Gate. The lengh of the hotel lobby is 90 meters with 30 meters height. Our guests will have access to the Oceana beach club located on the palm Jumeirah island. The club has a lazy river, sandy beach, restaurant and bar.

hotels.name: Down Town Dubai Hotel Apartment
hotels.desc: Located in Deira, Down Town Dubai Hotel Apartment is a perfect starting point from which to explore Dubai. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Down Town Dubai Hotel Apartment. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Dubai has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Down Town Dubai Hotel Apartment.

hotels.name: Atlantis Palm Jumeirah
hotels.desc:
The opulent Royal Tower offer 1539 luxurious guest rooms and suites with breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf or the Palm Jumeirah from every room. The exclusive Bridge Suite spanning the soaring towers as well as two stunning underwater Lost Chamber Suites will feature captivating and direct views into the marine habitat. Over 17 restaurants- bars-lounges-a night club and dining experiences are nestled in tropical enclaves-delightful hideaways or in the heart of Atlantis itself with four internationally renowned chefs. Aqua venture waterpark. Takes water-based attractions such as water slides- river rapids- waterfalls and water holes and adds first of its kind special effects and technology. Ziggurat temple offers 7 adventures rides including The Leap of Faith.
Resort Pools; A sophisticated Royal pool and Zero Entry Pool-For the families. The Lost Chambers extraordinary underwater ruins- which re-create artifacts from the 11000year-old civilization. Discover what sea creatures life in Atlantis might have been like as you meander through this world. Spa Fitness Centre- Feature 27wet and dries treatment rooms including steam room- sauna- vitality pool and relaxation area. A fully equipped fitness centre with stretch- yoga studio- a running track- 4tennis courts. Water Sports- Windsurfing-sea kayaking-small sailing vessels-air-blown floating devices is available. Dolphin bay a State of the art dolphin education centre interaction habitat-get up close and personal with one of the world most charismatic animals. The Avenues 7500 m2 of retail entertainment with a host of specialty restaurants-luxury boutiques- an exciting nightclub world class shopping facilities. Kids Club Open to all children from 3-12 years-4 zones Amphitheatre-Technology zone-Play zone Arts Crafts Club Rush-for the older- more sophisticated pre-teen teenager-will be a fully supervised No adults club.

hotels.name: Mövenpick Hotel Jumeirah Beach
hotels.desc: The Mövenpick Hotel Jumeirah Beach lies in the heart of one of Dubais newest dynamic and most lively urban locations, Jumeirah Beach Residence. This 5-star hotel is modern, chic and contemporary all in one, featuring lively dining and entertainment options, expansive recreational and modern meeting, conference and banqueting facilities and is only few steps away from the beach of the stunning Arabian Gulf. In order to improve the leisure facilities of "The Walk" at Jumeirah Beach Residence, project development works are currently taking place in the vicinity of the hotel. According to the information available to us, the project works are only taking place during the day and are not affecting the sea views from our hotel rooms. Every effort is made to minimize noise and inconvenience and all our facilities are operating as normal.

hotels.name: London Crown 2 Hotel Apartment
hotels.desc: London Crown 2 Hotel Apartment is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Dubai. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Dry cleaning, shuttle service, executive floor, elevator, tours are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. London Crown 2 Hotel Apartment combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Dubai unforgettable.

hotels.name: Grand Hyatt Dubai
hotels.desc: A perfect blend of city conference and resort hotel, is set within a lush oasis of 37acre of landscaped gardens. Featuring an outstanding combination of resort facilities, luxury hotel guestrooms and suites, residential apartments and one of the most advanced conference centres in the Middle East, the hotel is just minutes from Dubai's shopping, entertainment and business districts and within easy access of the international Airport. Grand Hyatt Dubai offers dazzling views of both the skyline and acclaimed creek of this enchanting Arabian city.

hotels.name: London Creek Hotel Apartments
hotels.desc: Stop at London Creek Hotel Apartments to discover the wonders of Dubai. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. All the necessary facilities, including elevator, concierge, 24-hour room service, business center, 24-hour front desk, are at hand. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, hot tub, steamroom, sauna, fitness center. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at London Creek Hotel Apartments.
